item.title: Supreme Court to weigh Trump's bid to oust Lisa Cook from Fed board
item.description: President Trump moved to fire Lisa Cook from the Federal Reserve Board of Governors in August.

item.title: Danish pension fund says it's selling all its U.S. Treasuries
item.description: The chief investment officer of AkademikerPension said the decision was not directly related to the rift between the U.S. and Greenland.

item.title: Second lady Usha Vance announces she is pregnant with fourth child
item.description: Vice President JD Vance and second lady Usha Vance announced they are expecting their fourth child.
